as.description: The element or component to render in place of the Transition itself.
as.description_zh: 要渲染的元素或组件，以代替 Transition 本身。

appear.description: Whether the transition should run on initial mount.
appear.description_zh: 转换是否应在初始挂载时运行。

unmount.description: Whether the element should be unmounted or hidden based on the show state.
unmount.description_zh: 应根据 show 状态卸载还是隐藏元素。

enter.description: Classes to add to the transitioning element during the entire enter phase.
enter.description_zh: 在整个 enter 阶段添加到 transitioning 元素的类。

enter-from.description: Classes to add to the transitioning element before the enter phase starts.
enter-from.description_zh: 在 enter 阶段开始之前要添加到 transitioning 元素的类。

enter-to.description:
Classes to add to the transitioning element immediately after the enter
phase starts.
enter-to.description_zh:
在 enter 后立即添加到 transitioning 元素的类
阶段开始。

entered.description:
Classes to add to the transitioning element once the transition is done.
These classes will persist after that, until it's time to leave.
entered.description_zh:
过渡完成后要添加到 transitioning 元素的类。
这些类将在那之后持续存在，直到该离开了。

leave.description: Classes to add to the transitioning element during the entire leave phase.
leave.description_zh: 在整个离开阶段添加到过渡元素的类。

leave-from.description: Classes to add to the transitioning element before the leave phase starts.
leave-from.description_zh: 在离开阶段开始之前要添加到过渡元素的类。

leave-to.description:
Classes to add to the transitioning element immediately after the leave
phase starts.
leave-to.description_zh:
在离开后立即添加到过渡元素的类
阶段开始。

events.name: before-enter
events.description: Emitted before the enter transition starts.
events.description_zh: 在 enter 过渡开始之前发出。

events.name: after-enter
events.description: Emitted after the enter transition finishes.
events.description_zh: 在 enter 过渡完成后发出。

events.name: before-leave
events.description: Emitted before the leave transition starts.
events.description_zh: 在离开过渡开始之前发出。

events.name: after-leave
events.description: Emitted after the leave transition finishes.
events.description_zh: 在离开过渡完成后发出。
